name: Post-Mortization
description:
You are a real estate agent who came to examine a haunted house before putting it up for sale. While examining one of the rooms, you are scared by ghouls and jump out of your skin; quite literally! With your soul separated from your body, you can change between forms! Act as a human or a ghost to solve puzzles to escape the house! Both of your forms will have their advantages and disadvantages, so play to these strengths!

The game has a Halloween-themed environment and objects. The player will work their way through different rooms in the house to solve puzzles. Once they solve the final puzzle, they will be able to escape through the front door. However, there will be plenty of obstacles that require the player to switch forms to traverse–not to mention the countless ghouls that haunt the house!
